column1: #Text=White Lotus sentry says : " They came out of nowhere .
#Text=" White Lotus sentry says : " They caught us by surprise , and Zaheer is an airbender now .
#Text=Do you have any idea the power these criminals possess ?
#Text=Individually , they can take down any bender .
#Text=Put them all together , they could take down the entire world .
#Text=And now you 're telling me that their leader is an airbender ?
#Text=" White Lotus sentry says : " We can track them .
#Text=" Zuko says : " We do n't need to track them , I know exactly where they 're going .
#Text=Notify the new chiefs of the Northern Water Tribe that an attack on their prison is imminent , and send word to Lin Beifong in Republic City .
#Text=" White Lotus sentry says : " Where are you going ?
